channel.title: Netherlands on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Netherlands on Rusland 1

item.title: Little Russia (Zemfira Amsterdam)
item.description: When I dare to speak some words in Russian, it is immediately noticed. Hear that, over there, a Dutchman! Once inside, it becomes even clearer. Perhaps because the coats are now stored, in a safe that causes four times heavy traffic in the corridors.

item.title: Russians on the Netherlands and the Dutch
item.description: Dasha and Tamara Dutch people are known for being direct, a sentiment often echoed by Tamara Zhirova, who would know, as she lives in Amsterdam. (Where she also teaches Russian. You can find her on YouTube.) An entertaining conversation, mainly thanks to Tamara, who also sings for us.
